definition: to choose for some purpose/to select and use
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: If seller's designs are used, the design numbers must be stated in full.
sentences.chinese: 若選用賣方花樣，必須詳細註明花號。

sentences.english: This paper can serve as the reference for the mills to select the board machine.
sentences.chinese: 本文試述紙板成形器的選用與發展趨勢，供同行參考。

sentences.english: Welcome the various countries user to select " Bai Yue" the sign miniature bulb.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎世界各國用戶選用“白月”牌小燈泡。

sentences.english: Bigger isn't better, so skip the huge tomatoes and giant peppers.
sentences.chinese: 越大越差，因此不要選用那些大個西紅柿和大個辣椒。

sentences.english: You should remove those ciphers or a client might select one of them.
sentences.chinese: 應該刪除這些密碼，否則客戶機可能會選用它們。

sentences.english: Bigger correlation coefficients can be obtained by the broad heritability method.
sentences.chinese: 按廣義遺傳力法選用研究性狀則相關係數大。

sentences.english: The results provide foundation for choosing antitrichomonal agents for clinical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 試驗結果爲臨牀選用抗禽毛滴蟲藥物提供了依據。

sentences.english: The Mosel valley produces the best grapes for Germany's most famous wine, Riesling.
sentences.chinese: 此酒選用摩塞爾山谷出產的優質雷司令葡萄釀製而成。

sentences.english: We will use high-quality float glass and high-quality film.
sentences.chinese: 我們選用優質的浮法玻璃和優質的膠片。

sentences.english: All our drinks come with whole milk, unless you ordred something different. We also offer nonfat milk.
sentences.chinese: 所有飲品均選用全脂奶，你可選擇脫脂奶。

sentences.english: Made with grapes from the prestigious Maipo Valley, This wine has an intense ruby red colour, and possesses an intense aroma of spices and chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 選用邁坡山谷出產的美樂葡萄釀製而成的這款乾紅。

sentences.english: It's knitted by hand with mobair from Australia.
sentences.chinese: 是選用澳毛手工編織成的。

sentences.english: An optional bow member clips about the pinna.
sentences.chinese: 可選用的弓形件夾設在耳廓的周圍。

sentences.english: And related viscous-elastic parameters were gained according to appropriate simulation model.
sentences.chinese: 並選用合適的模型擬合出有關的粘彈性參數。

sentences.english: During choose the direct current power supply, pay attention to the negative and positive.
sentences.chinese: 選用直流供電時，注意正負極標識。

sentences.english: We should select antibiotics by drug-sensitive test to control hospital infection.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀應根據藥敏試驗選用抗菌藥物，控制院內感染。

definition: to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为
to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
to produce (by natural growth, or by manufacture, mining etc)/to yield/to turn out/produce/products
